DataElement.preferredName: Echocardiogram Recording Echocardiography Technician Certification Review Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response indicating whether or not an echocardiogram should be submitted for sonographer certification review.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Echocardiogram Recording Echocardiography Technician Certification Review
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An image of the heart produced by ultrasonography.:A test that uses high-frequency sound waves (ultrasound) to create an image of the heart._A person skilled in the performance of the technical or procedural aspects of a profession._The process by which a person demonstrates specific knowledge, skills, or abilities in the view of a certifying body.  Similarly, the process by which a product or process can achieve certification indicating its suitability for a specific purpose._The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An image of the heart produced by ultrasonography.

Concepts.definition: An image of the heart produced by ultrasonography.

Property.preferredDefinition: A test that uses high-frequency sound waves (ultrasound) to create an image of the heart._A person skilled in the performance of the technical or procedural aspects of a profession._The process by which a person demonstrates specific knowledge, skills, or abilities in the view of a certifying body.  Similarly, the process by which a product or process can achieve certification indicating its suitability for a specific purpose._The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.

Concepts.definition: A procedure that uses high-frequency sound waves (ultrasound) to create an image of the heart.
A person skilled in the performance of the technical or procedural aspects of a profession.

The process by which a person demonstrates specific knowledge, skills, or abilities in the view of a certifying body.  Similarly, the process by which a product or process can achieve certification indicating its suitability for a specific purpose.
The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
